PEIP_INF_Channel::getName (  )

PEIP_INF_Channel::send ( PEIP_INF_Message $  message,
$  timeout = -1 
)

Send a message, blocking until either the message is accepted or the specified timeout period elapses.

Parameters:
message the Message to send
timeout the timeout in milliseconds
Returns:
true if the message is sent successfully, false</false> if the specified timeout period elapses or the send is interrupted

Implemented in PEIP_ABS_Interceptable_Message_Channel, PEIP_Direct_Channel, PEIP_Message_Channel, and PEIP_Pipe.
